select A.* from ( select rownum as rnum, B.* from ( select * from event
order by event_no asc) B
where rownum <= #end#) A where A.rnum >= #start#
sqlMap.update: update event set event_no=#event_no#, event_title=#event_title#, event_start=#event_start#, event_end=#event_end#, event_src=#event_src#, event_detail=#event_detail# where event_no=#event_no#
